title: Game won't load after champ select!
body: I got a couple maestro errors  early but I think they stopped when I started running league as admin. But the game still won't load after lobby. This is twice now this has happened in the last 15min and I got a 5min penalty earlier when I was in a lobby and got a maestro error. Everything was working fine this morning and I didnt change anything on my computer since then.

replies.body: I'm not sure what fixed it, all I did was run my anti-malware and anti-virus. Nothing came up so I don't know but now it's working. :/

Since you mentioned Maestro errors along with the issues loading into matches, I suspect this is caused by a number of local network settings that can conflict with League. I suggest working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as your next step in troubleshooting this.

Let me know if those steps helped.
It is still happening.... 3 times now. Really hope I don't get banned or something for this.
Damn, I just ran a repair but I wont have time to see if it worked till later, Ill try to keep this updated.
Having the same error (it's been going on for over 24 hours).  Messed up my friends' teemoing game yesterday.  I sent in a ticket but I still haven't gotten anything.
